title: Customer Experience Practical Skills Enhancement: Effective Instructional Design and PBL Application in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the correlation between online instructional design elements and academic achievement through survey-based research.
Learners can design instructional materials that optimize germane cognitive load for learners in a PBL environment.
Learners can develop language education PBL projects applicable in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
